specific_question: What is our average employee satisfaction score among our customer-facing staff in Q2 2025?
answer: 85% of our customer-facing staff reported high job satisfaction in Q2 2025.
justification: Identifying key drivers of employee satisfaction to inform our content marketing and human resources strategies.
